title: parabramhanunE
sahitya:
parabrahmamunE patiyani nammitini bhavarOga shamana praNatArthi haruni

anupallavi

 aruNa kiraNa kamalamulO bhramaramu cEsina bhakti rItilO

caraNam

 tava nAmamulalO tAra tamyamu lEni shivarAma tatva smaraNamutO 
navakOTi rAma nAma meravini bhuvanamandu tyAgarAju kOrina
